caption.p: 3-Carene (violet colour ball and stick model) interactions with M Pro represented in (A) solid ribbon model with; (B) active sites of amino acid residues represented in red colour line model; (c) hydrophobic interactions (alkyl and pi-alkyl are shown in light pink colour dotted lines), van der Waals interactions (light green colour circles). Solvent accessible surfaces of the interacting residues are represented by a blue halo around the residues.
